articles.title: Patients with high blood pressure have twice the risk of dying from coronavirus, study finds - CNN
articles.description: High blood pressure may double the risk of death from coronavirus.
articles.content:
(CNN)Coronavirus patients with high blood pressure have twice the risk of dying from the infection, an international study has found.
